item.title: Tekken 8 winter update and Season 2 announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/tekken-8-winter-update-and-season-2-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Next downloadable content character to be announced at The Game Awards 2024.

Bandai Namco has announced the Tekken 8 winter update and second season. Additionally, the final character of the game’s Playable Character Year 1 Pass, who is due out this winter, will be announced at The Game Awards 2024 on December 12.

The winter update will add a further evolved photo mode, bonus levels added to Fight Pass, additional customization slots, customized characters in the main menu, Tekken fan art in-game, and the 30th Anniversary Fight Pass.

Season 2 will feature a system and major balance update, new moves for all characters, and the next Tekken World Tour.

Tekken 8 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the trailer below.

Winter Update and Season 2 Announce Trailer
